tool_description: Processes and validates course substitution requests, checking approval status and updating degree requirements accordingly.

original_requirement.description: Original course code or requirement being substituted

substitute_course.description: Course code being used as substitute

error_messages: Student not found: The provided student_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid course code: Original requirement or substitute course code is not valid.
Duplicate substitution: A substitution for this requirement has already been processed.
Invalid approval status: approval_status must be 'pending', 'approved', or 'denied'.
Substitution not equivalent: The substitute course does not meet the learning objectives of the original requirement.
Missing authorization: Course substitutions require proper departmental or advisor approval.
usage: Provide student ID, original requirement, substitute course, and reason for substitution. The tool processes the request and updates the student's degree audit accordingly.

substitution_id.description: Unique identifier for the substitution request

processing_status.description: Current status of the substitution processing

approval_required_from.description: Array of departments or individuals who must approve the substitution

updated_requirements.description: Array showing how degree requirements are modified by this substitution
